attributes.action: Let the local councils make their own decision with regards to road toll charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With regards to the above. in the words of the P.M. " THE GOVERNMENT ARE THE SERVANTS OF THE PEOPLE "not vice versa and should not threaten to withhold funds from us.We were led to understand that this new administration would heed the peoples opinions (something that has'nt happened for the last ten years)
